testcase.name: Articles Endpoints POST /article should create a new article for the logged-in user
testcase.classname: should create a new article for the logged-in user

testcase.name: Articles Endpoints POST /article should return 400 if title or content is missing
testcase.classname: should return 400 if title or content is missing

testcase.name: Articles Endpoints GET /articles/:articleId? should retrieve a specific article by ID
testcase.classname: should retrieve a specific article by ID

testcase.name: Articles Endpoints GET /articles/:articleId? should retrieve articles by the logged-in user when no ID is provided
testcase.classname: should retrieve articles by the logged-in user when no ID is provided

testcase.name: Articles Endpoints GET /articles/:articleId? should return 404 if no articles found for the provided ID or username
testcase.classname: should return 404 if no articles found for the provided ID or username

testcase.name: Articles Endpoints GET /articles/:articleId? should return 500 if an unexpected error occurs
testcase.classname: should return 500 if an unexpected error occurs

testcase.name: Auth Endpoint should register a new user
Auth Endpoint should login a user
Auth Endpoint should logout current user
Profile Endpoints GET /headline/:username? should get the headline of the logged-in user when username is not provided
testcase.classname: should get the headline of the logged-in user when username is not provided

testcase.name: Profile Endpoints GET /headline/:username? should return a 404 if the user does not exist
testcase.classname: should return a 404 if the user does not exist

testcase.name: Profile Endpoints PUT /headline should update the headline of the logged-in user
testcase.classname: should update the headline of the logged-in user

testcase.name: Profile Endpoints PUT /headline should return a 400 if no headline is provided
testcase.classname: should return a 400 if no headline is provided
